metadata.synopsis: One of the guards at the door to the inner temple. He's been standing here for a while and shouldn've been switched out a while ago, but the change of guard never showed. He's very bored.

0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Nozk
0.text: You outsiders never have ta guard the borin' posts.

1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Nozk
1.text: Thought you was my replacement, but noooo. Bet Mirg has drunk herself stupid.
